Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Visual confirmation: Russian forces have advanced...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Visual confirmation: Russian forces have reached and hold a point on the 00532 Konstantinovka-Ugledar highway. A Russian flag was raised on the wreckage of a car at 47.8401833,37.3786929. Russian troops are getting very close to cutting Ugledar's… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Visual confirmation: Russian forces have advanced to the Vodyanoe fortification – Mariinka-Ugledar direction.The vital fortification guards the Vodyanoe road and 00532 highway intersection. If lost, it will completely cut all supply routes to Ugledar.Ukrainian UAV footage shows Russian forces have also advanced in Konstantinovka itself. The entire eastern border of the city is now under Russian control.
